title: 4.00 GPA and first class honours!
description: University degrees aren't everything but this shows dedication!

title: I built this website!
description: How many candidates go to this much effort to show their enthusiasm?

title: Passionate about teaching and mentoring!
description: From teaching software development to mentoring at REA, writing blog posts to developing free online courses, I love sharing knowledge and helping people to learn new things!

title: Love to learn!
description: I always try to work something unfamiliar into every project I work on. This keeps things fresh and interesting, while helping me keep up with the ever changing web development landscape.

title: Great at making mistakes ... and learning from them!
description: Trying new things, taking risks and revisiting the process based on their success or failure is the way I like to work!

title: Believe in building in the open and making the world accessible!
description: The web should be open and accessible to everyone! I try to keep this front of mind anytime I am developing software!

title: Love Mario Kart!
description: 3 star trophy in all four CCs on Mario Kart 8 (Wii U). Slowly working my way back up on Switch.
